name: CVE-2022-42111
description: A Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Sharing module's user notification in Liferay Portal 7.2.1 through 7.4.2, and Liferay DXP 7.2 before fix pack 19, and 7.3 before update 4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML by sharing an asset with a crafted payload.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:liferay_portal:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_4:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_5:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:-:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_6:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_7:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_8:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_9:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_10:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_11:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:update_1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:update_2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:update_3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_14:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_12:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_13:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.2:fix_pack_15:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
